title: Musarum delici√¶: or, The Muses recreation. Conteining severall select pieces of sportive vvit. / By Sr J.M. and Ja:S.
author: Mennes, John, Sir, 1599-1671.
publisher: Printed for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Anchor in the New Exchange,
notes: Sr J.M. = Sir John Mennes; Ja: S. = James Smith.

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
